name: vscode-css-navigation
description: Peek definition from HTML document or HTML template, into a CSS / LESS / SCSS document, by the HTML tag name, class or id attribute

CSSNavigation.cssFileExtensions.description: Specify the extensions of the css file, only the matched files will be peeked.

CSSNavigation.excludeGlobPatterns.description: Specify a glob pattern, files whose path match it will be excluded from the CSS lookup.

CSSNavigation.definitionsOrderBy.description: Specify the definitions order. if you prefer the scss definitions always before css definitions, choose "extension" and makesure "cssFileExtensions" item "scss" before "css".

CSSNavigation.trace.server.description: Traces the communication between VS Code and the language server.

scripts.vscode:prepublish: cd client && npm run update-vscode && cd .. && npm run compile
scripts.postinstall: cd client && npm install && cd ../server && npm install && cd ..
